document.text:
From: Nicole Simmons 
To: Nathan NYSD Chambers < 
Cc: Jeff Pagliuca , Laura Menninger 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] U.S. v. Maxwell, Case No. 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) [Maxwell's Resp Ltrs. re. Co-
Conspirator Statements and Ex. 52] 
Date: Mon, 15 Nov 2021 22:55:29 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.11.15 JSP_Ltr._re Rule 801(d)(2)(e).pdf; 2021.11.15 JSP_Ltr._re._EX._52.pdf 
Inline-Images: image001.jpg 
Dear Judge Nathan: 
At the request of Jeffrey Pagliuca, please see attached Ms. Maxwell's Letters in Response to (1) The Government's 
Justification for Admission of Co-Conspirator Statements and (2) The Government's Justification for Admission of Exhibit 
52. 
Pursuant to our established protocol, we are submitting the Letters to the Court under temporary seal to allow the 
government to propose any redactions it deems necessary. 
Regards, 
Nicole 
Nicole Simmons 
Haddon, Morgan and 
Foreman, P.C. 
150 East 10th Avenue 
Denver, Colorado 
80203 
FX 
www.h
EFTA00010223
